title: Convert Image Files (JPG, PNG) to URLs and Reduce File Size for FREE
author: simonscrapes
workflow_json:

Prompt takes input of image description from the `set image description` node and generates using OpenAI"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"95a551f0-c164-4ac7-94e2-5aac4c5fc548","name":"Sticky Note51","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[80,6060],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":619.0692735087202,"height":320.9196076003899,"content":"**Upload image to ImgBB, Optimise using ReSmush.it and store as URL**
"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"93737b01-cd2f-4f49-b611-f47782a9eed8","name":"Sticky Note52","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-1160,6020],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":773.6179704580734,"height":875.8289847608302,"content":"## Convert Image Files (JPG, PNG, JPEG) to URLs and Reduce File Size

## Use Case
Transform and optimize images for web use:
- You need to host local images online
- You want to reduce image file sizes automatically
- You need image URLs for web content
- You want to generate and optimize AI-created images

## What this Workflow Does
The workflow processes images through two services:
- Uploads images to ImgBB for hosting and URL generation (free but need API key)
- Optimizes images using ReSmush.it to reduce file size (free)
- Optional: Creates images using OpenAI's image generation
- Returns optimized image URLs ready for use

## Setup
1. Create an [ImgBB account](https://api.imgbb.com/) and get your API key
2. Add your ImgBB API key to the HTTP Request node (key parameter)
3. Optional: Configure OpenAI credentials for image generation
4. Connect your image input source

## How to Adjust it to Your Needs
- Skip OpenAI nodes if using your own image files
- Adjust image optimization parameters
- Customize image hosting settings
- Modify output format for your needs


Made by Simon @ [automake.io](https://automake.io)"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"8f4bfed3-820c-495d-9d5f-0dbdae7beb1a","name":"Sticky Note53","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[80,6400],"parameters":{"color":3,"width":620.0617659833041,"height":218.46830740679286,"content":"**REQUIRED**

**ImgBB - image hosting i.e. gives you an img url**
1. [Create an ImgBB account](https://api.imgbb.com/) (free) and generate an api key
2. Input the API key as Query Auth - `name`=key, `value`=your-own-api-key


**ReSmush.it - image optimisation i.e. shrinks the file size of the image**
1. No account or auth needed
2. Url will pass from previous node"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"085ef8b4-4762-4675-a1fd-6771f09628fb","name":"Sticky Note54","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-340,6400],"parameters":{"color":2,"width":409.8920345317687,"height":133.75846341937205,"content":"**OPTIONAL**
`Set image description` to create an Image using OpenAI and your own prompt (requires: API credentials) or alternatively replace these nodes with your own image file"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"ee6c01dd-94fd-4ebf-baf6-03360e01ffc0","name":"Set image description","type":"n8n-nodes-base.set","position":[-300,6220],"parameters":{"options":{},"assignments":{"assignments":[{"id":"9026b5d5-97ed-484e-a168-ac1c57a60fa1","name":"description","type":"string","value":"=Balancing Autonomy and Human Interaction in AI Applications, featuring a person"}]}},"typeVersion":3.4},{"id":"7bb7374c-a11e-4ac8-8ef7-ba506fa8619d","name":"Generate Image","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.openAi","position":[-100,6220],"parameters":{"prompt":"=Create a minimalist professional illustration of {{ $json.description }} with these specifications:

1. Visual Style:
- Modern tech-focused minimalist design
- Clean, uncluttered composition
- Professional business aesthetic
- Soft shadows and subtle depth
- 2-3 primary colors maximum plus white space

2. Core Elements:
- Main icon/symbol representing {{ $json.description }} as focal point
- Simple supporting elements representing key sections
- Subtle connecting elements showing relationship
- Plenty of white space (40% minimum)
- No text overlay

3. Technical Requirements:
- High contrast for clarity
- Crisp edges and smooth lines
- Professional lighting from upper left
- Matte finish
- Square aspect ratio (1:1)","options":{},"resource":"image"},"credentials":{"openAiApi":{"id":"gaOzEcyxSfqBNYsI","name":"OpenAi account"}},"typeVersion":1.4},{"id":"87f80a8d-932a-46bc-b003-877883ba73c8","name":"No Operation, do nothing","type":"n8n-nodes-base.noOp","position":[760,6220],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1}],"pinData":{},"connections":{"Generate Image":{"main":[[{"node":"Upload Img to ImgBB for URL","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Set image description":{"main":[[{"node":"Generate Image","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Store Optimised Image ImgBB":{"main":[[{"node":"No Operation, do nothing","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Upload Img to ImgBB for URL":{"main":[[{"node":"ReSmush.it Image Optimisation","type":"main","index":0}]]},"ReSmush.it Image Optimisation":{"main":[[{"node":"Store Optimised Image ImgBB","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
readme:
## Use Case

Transform and optimize images for web use:

  * You need to host local images online
  * You want to reduce image file sizes automatically
  * You need image URLs for web content
  * You want to generate and optimize AI-created images



## What this Workflow Does

The workflow processes images through two services:

  * Uploads images to ImgBB for hosting and URL generation (free but need API key)
  * Optimizes images using [ReSmush.it](http://ReSmush.it) to reduce file size (free)
  * Optional: Creates images using OpenAI's image generation
  * Returns optimized image URLs ready for use



## Setup

  1. Create an [ImgBB account](https://api.imgbb.com/) and get your API key
  2. Add your ImgBB API key to the HTTP Request node (key parameter)
  3. Optional: Configure OpenAI credentials for image generation
  4. Connect your image input source



## How to Adjust it to Your Needs

  * Skip OpenAI nodes if using your own image files
  * Adjust image optimization parameters
  * Customize image hosting settings
  * Modify output format for your needs



More templates and n8n workflows >>> [@simonscrapes](https://www.youtube.com/@simonscrapes?sub_confirmation=1)
readme_html:
Use Case

Transform and optimize images for web use:

  • You need to host local images online
  • You want to reduce image file sizes automatically
  • You need image URLs for web content
  • You want to generate and optimize AI-created images

What this Workflow Does

The workflow processes images through two services:

  • Uploads images to ImgBB for hosting and URL generation (free but need API key)
  • Optimizes images using ReSmush.it to reduce file size (free)
  • Optional: Creates images using OpenAI's image generation
  • Returns optimized image URLs ready for use

Setup

  1. Create an ImgBB account and get your API key
  2. Add your ImgBB API key to the HTTP Request node (key parameter)
  3. Optional: Configure OpenAI credentials for image generation
  4. Connect your image input source

How to Adjust it to Your Needs

  • Skip OpenAI nodes if using your own image files
  • Adjust image optimization parameters
  • Customize image hosting settings
  • Modify output format for your needs

More templates and n8n workflows >>> @simonscrapes
readme_zh:
## 使用场景

为网络用途转换和优化图像：

  * 需要将本地图片托管到线上
  * 希望自动减小图片文件体积
  * 需要获取网页内容所需的图片链接
  * 需要生成并优化AI创作的图像
title_zh: 免费将图片文件（JPG、PNG）转换为URL并减小文件大小

提示接收来自“设置图片描述”节点的图片描述输入，并通过OpenAI生成内容。"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"95a551f0-c164-4ac7-94e2-5aac4c5fc548","name":"Sticky Note51","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[80,6060],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":619.0692735087202,"height":320.9196076003899,"content":"**上传图片至ImgBB，使用ReSmush.it优化并存储为URL**"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"93737b01-cd2f-4f49-b611-f47782a9eed8","name":"Sticky Note52","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-1160,6020],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":773.6179704580734,"height":875.8289847608302,"content":"## 将图片文件（JPG/PNG/JPEG）转换为URL并压缩体积

## 使用场景
为网络应用转换和优化图片：
- 需要将本地图片托管到线上
- 希望自动减小图片文件体积
- 需要获取图片URL用于网页内容
- 需要生成并优化AI创作的图片

## 工作流功能
本流程通过两项服务处理图片：
- 上传至ImgBB图床生成URL（免费但需API密钥）
- 使用ReSmush.it进行图片压缩优化（免费）
- 可选：通过OpenAI生成AI图片
- 返回可直接使用的优化后图片URL

## 配置步骤
1. 注册[ImgBB账户](https://api.imgbb.com/)获取API密钥
2. 将API密钥填入HTTP请求节点（key参数）
3. 可选：配置OpenAI凭证用于图片生成
4. 连接您的图片输入源

## 自定义调整
- 使用自有图片时可跳过OpenAI节点
- 调整图片优化参数
- 自定义图床托管设置
- 按需修改输出格式

由Simon制作 @ [automake.io](https://automake.io)"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"8f4bfed3-820c-495d-9d5f-0dbdae7beb1a","name":"Sticky Note53","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[80,6400],"parameters":{"color":3,"width":620.0617659833041,"height":218.46830740679286,"content":"**必填项**

**ImgBB - 图片托管服务（即提供图片URL）**

2. 在Query Auth中输入API密钥 - `name`设为key，`value`填入你的专属API密钥  

**ReSmush.it - 图片优化服务（即压缩图片文件大小）**  
1. 无需账户或认证  
2. URL将从前一节点自动传递"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"085ef8b4-4762-4675-a1fd-6771f09628fb","name":"Sticky Note54","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-340,6400],"parameters":{"color":2,"width":409.8920345317687,"height":133.75846341937205,"content":"**可选**

- No text overlay

3. Technical Requirements:
- High contrast for clarity
- Crisp edges and smooth lines
- Professional lighting from upper left
- Matte finish
- Square aspect ratio (1:1)","options":{},"resource":"image"},"credentials":{"openAiApi":{"id":"gaOzEcyxSfqBNYsI","name":"OpenAi account"}},"typeVersion":1.4},{"id":"87f80a8d-932a-46bc-b003-877883ba73c8","name":"No Operation, do nothing","type":"n8n-nodes-base.noOp","position":[760,6220],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1}],"pinData":{},"connections":{"Generate Image":{"main":[[{"node":"Upload Img to ImgBB for URL","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Set image description":{"main":[[{"node":"Generate Image","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Store Optimised Image ImgBB":{"main":[[{"node":"No Operation, do nothing","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Upload Img to ImgBB for URL":{"main":[[{"node":"ReSmush.it Image Optimisation","type":"main","index":0}]]},"ReSmush.it Image Optimisation":{"main":[[{"node":"Store Optimised Image ImgBB","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
